item.title: Updated article on Getting Started with Manim
item.description: I've updated my article on how to get started with manim. It's now updated for the latest version of manim.

item.title: My New Website is Live
item.description:
I've finally deployed my new (extremely lightweight) website. This'll be a place where I publish guides, musings on various things, and possibly much more ðŸ˜€

In the spirit of the old internet, this website is written to be simple and minimal. I think this is how all websites should be designed.

There's no stupid JavaScript running. No cookies. Just HTML and CSS, as it should be.

item.title: Getting Started with Manim
item.description: I wrote a short article on getting started with manim. Hopefully it'll get updated soon.
